Clause: Italian chemical giant Montedison S.p. A., through its Montedison Acquisition N.V. indirect unit, began its $37-a-share tender offer for all the common shares outstanding of Erbamont N.V., a maker of pharmaceuticals
The offer, advertised in today's editions of The Wall Street Journal,
is scheduled to expire at the end of November.
Montedison currently owns about 72% of Erbamont's common shares outstanding.
The offer is being launched pursuant to a previously announced agreement between the companies.
